protein.specific_function: This protein is, quantitatively, the main protein synthesized and secreted in the endometrium from mid-luteal phase of the menstrual cycle and during the first semester of pregnancy

reference.reference_text: Julkunen M, Seppala M, Janne OA: Complete amino acid sequence of human placental protein 14: a progesterone-regulated uterine protein homologous to beta-lactoglobulins. Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 1988 Dec;85(23):8845-9.
